import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get next-step type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types/{ticketNextStepTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves details for a specific next-step type definition. Next-step types define the categories of tasks that can be created within tickets (e.g., 'Follow-up Call', 'Research Issue', 'Order Parts'). Use this to display type metadata or validate type configurations.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketNextStepTypeId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) to list available types and extract `TicketNextStepTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List types: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) → identify type of interest
2. Get details: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types/\{ticketNextStepTypeId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-step-type)
3. Use: Apply type metadata when creating or displaying next steps

**Response Fields**: Includes type name, description, default settings, and whether the type is active.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) – List all next-step types
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-next-step) – Create next step using this type
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) – List next steps on ticket

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketNextStepTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the next-step type.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Next-step type retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Metadata describing a next-step type that can be attached to tickets.","properties":{"TicketNextStepTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next-step type.","example":"22222222-2222-4222-8222-222222222222"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the next-step type.","example":"Requestor acknowledgment"},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Optional icon key used by the UI.","nullable":true,"example":"check"},"CanBeForceResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the next step can be force resolved.","example":true},"CanBeUserResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the next step can be resolved by a non-agent user.","example":false},"RequiredToCloseTicket":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this next-step type is required before closing tickets.","example":false}},"required":["TicketNextStepTypeId","Name","CanBeForceResolved","CanBeUserResolved","RequiredToCloseTicket"],"title":"TicketNextStepType"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
